main event: An unidentified flying object observed near La Veta, Colorado on 25 November 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as greenish-blue, luminous, and jelly-like in consistency., The sighting lasted for approximately five seconds., The object was estimated to be at 15,000 feet and traveled at half the speed of a meteorite., A pair of witnesses, including a state senator, reported the sighting under clear skies with no visible clouds., The object suddenly disappeared from view over Mt. Mestas.
witness description: A state senator and his wife described the sighting.
